issues.recommendation: Title is 7 characters. Aim for 50-60 characters.
Add a compelling meta description (150-160 characters)
Add exactly one H1 tag with your main keyword
Add og:title, og:description, and og:image for better social sharing
Add canonical tag to prevent duplicate content issues
Add Product and Organization schema markup for rich results
Add more internal links to improve site structure and crawlability
Set appropriate Cache-Control headers (max-age) for static assets
Use semantic HTML5 elements (<main>, <nav>, <header>, <footer>) for better screen reader navigation
Add a "Skip to main content" link at the top of the page for keyboard users
Add referrer-policy header for enhanced security
Ensure cart is accessible and visible to users, preferably in the header
Add search to help customers find products. Stores with search have 25% higher conversion rates.
Add email capture to build your marketing list. Email marketing has an average ROI of 4200%.
Add customer testimonials, reviews, or "as seen in" badges to build trust
Consider adding more products. Stores with 10+ products typically see higher conversion rates and better SEO.
Organize products into collections to improve navigation and help customers find products easier.

issues.issue: No bundle or "Frequently Bought Together" offers
issues.recommendation: Implement bundle deals to increase cart value by 20-40%

issues.issue: No visible promo code field or discount messaging
issues.recommendation: Add promo code field and promotional banners to encourage conversions

issues.issue: No easy customer support options visible
issues.recommendation: Add live chat, WhatsApp button, or prominent phone number to reduce cart abandonment by 15-20%

issues.issue: No wishlist or save for later functionality
issues.recommendation: Add wishlist feature to capture interested buyers and enable remarketing

issues.issue: No abandoned cart recovery mechanism detected
issues.recommendation: Implement email capture at cart stage to recover 10-15% of abandoned carts

issues.issue: No loyalty or rewards program detected
issues.recommendation: Implement a loyalty program to increase customer lifetime value by 25-50%
Install Google Analytics 4 for conversion tracking and ROI measurement
Install Facebook Pixel to improve ad performance by 20-40% through retargeting
Install TikTok Pixel if running TikTok ads for better targeting
